author: EpicPhil
body:
Currently PowerShell Workflow does not support parameter validation on nested workflows.
It also does not support complex types on parameters. As more automation and orchestration tools are using PSWorkflow, I would like to see these limitations removed.

comments.author: alexandair
comments.body: I don't think this is related to open source PowerShell. Could you post it to UserVoice?

comments.author: EpicPhil
comments.body: Yep. I posted it here as there were already some workflow issues submitted. [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell/suggestions/16276288-parameter)

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body:
We don't support PSWorkflow in open PowerShell:

Workflow is not supported in PowerShell Core.
- CategoryInfo          : ParserError: (:) [], ParentContainsErrorRecordException
- FullyQualifiedErrorId : WorkflowNotSupportedInPowerShellCore

I'm not aware of any plans to support it, does anyone else know?

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Closing as this bug is not applicable to the repository in its current state, and I know of no plans to support workflow for this project yet. There is also a semi-similar issue here (again, only for desktop): https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/2222

title: Limitations on Workflow Parameters
